description: [``botocore``] Application Signals now supports creating Service Level Objectives on service dependencies. Users can now create or update SLOs on discovered service dependencies to monitor their standard application metrics.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for environment type WINDOWS_SERVER_2022_CONTAINER in ProjectEnvironment
[``botocore``] Fix for customer issues related to AWS account ID and size limitation for token.
[``botocore``] This is an Amazon ECS documentation only update to address various tickets.
[``botocore``] Release feature of errorlogging for lex bot, customer can config this feature in bot version to generate log for error exception which helps debug

[``botocore``] Added support for SMPTE 2110 inputs when running a channel in a MediaLive Anywhere cluster. This feature enables ingestion of SMPTE 2110-compliant video, audio, and ancillary streams by reading SDP files that AWS Elemental MediaLive can retrieve from a network source.
